document.full_text: egypt's prosecutor general, abdel-maguid mahmoud, ordered that the detention of ousted president hosni mubarak be extended for another 15 days pending investigation.
document.title: middle east: egypt: mubarak's release delayed
lines_and_colors: egypt's prosecutor general, abdel-maguid mahmoud, ordered that the detention of ousted president hosni mubarak be extended for another 15 days pending investigation.
